translated: he was extinguished, that one of great fame.
with a pleasant ripening, a pleasant result;
I went to the Tāvatiṃsa heaven.
As I was lifting up my feet,
It is a gain for them, it is a good gain for you,
Having done a deed after the extinction ,
A deed was also done by me,
I step on the golden footstool,
this is the fruit of meritorious deeds.
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of the footstool.
Welcome indeed it was to me,
the Buddha’s instruction has been carried out.
